```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(rstan)
library(bayesplot)
library(bayesrules)
```

```{r}
# a
set.seed(84735)
mh_simulation_small_w <- mh_tour(N = 5000, w = 0.01)
ggplot(mh_simulation_small_w, aes(x = iteration, y = mu)) + 
  geom_line() + 
  lims(y = c(1.6, 6.4))
```
